Pit-Road ER-501 Nissan Sunny 1970 Trans-Nix Fuji 100km Winner S. Suzuki

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: http://pitroad.s232.xrea.com/other/index.php?itemid=953

There's even less information about this than the average Japanese racer. :( What is known is that Suzuki won this event but it's unclear if this was the first time the Sunny was raced or the first time it won. Oh well. Pit-Road appears to be more well-known for military models but they did dabble in a series of racers, this one a modified Ebbro release.
